##analyzing abundance
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(car)
library(nlme)
library(lattice)
library(MASS)
library(dplyr)
library(vegan)
library(FSA)

#windows:
new_df = read.csv("C:\\users\\juliena\\desktop\\data\\drop net\\csv files\\Diversity_abundance.csv")
legare_net = read.csv("C:\\users\\juliena\\desktop\\data\\drop net\\csv files\\Legare.csv")
#ngs_df = read.csv("C:\\users\\juliena\\desktop\\data\\drop net\\csv files\\Without grass shrimp\\no_grass_shrimp.csv")

#mac:
new_df = read.csv("~/Documents/Ribbed mussel/Data/Drop net/CSV files/Diversity_abundance.csv")
legare_net = read.csv("~/Documents/Ribbed mussel/Data/Drop net/CSV files/Legare.csv")
#ngs_df = read.csv("~/Documents/Ribbed mussel/Data/Drop net/CSV files/Without grass shrimp/no_grass_shrimp.csv")

#species richness:
sp_rich = legare_net %>%
  group_by(Order) %>%
  summarise(length(unique(Species)))

new_df$Season = c(rep("Fall 2016", 42), rep("Winter 2017", 44), rep("Spring 2017", 24)) #N = 21, 22, 12

#models
test_x = lm(log(Abundance + 1) ~ Treatment * Season + CharlestonHeight + Salinity, data = new_df) 
summary(test_x)
plot(test_x)
#cube root transform white shrimp abundance for its analysis

test_y = lm(Richness ~ Treatment * Season + CharlestonHeight + Salinity, data = new_df) 
summary(test_y)
plot(test_y)

test_z = lm(Shannon ~ Treatment * Season + CharlestonHeight + Salinity, data = new_df) 
summary(test_z)
plot(test_z)

test_w = lm(Simpson ~ Treatment * Season + CharlestonHeight + Salinity, data = new_df) #resids not good
summary(test_w)
plot(test_w)
```


##Multivariate community composition
```{r, echo = FALSE}
#Community composition and direct ordination (trying both RDA and CCA)
marsh = new_df[, c(seq(7, 17))] #All species except for A. heterochaelis

#rda analysis
marsh_rda = rda(sqrt(marsh) ~ Treatment + Season + Salinity + CharlestonHeight, data=new_df) #square root transformation makes treatment significant
marsh_rda
plot(marsh_rda)
plot(marsh_rda, display = c('sp', 'cn'))

marsh_rda2 = rda(sqrt(marsh) ~ Treatment + Condition(Temperature) +
                 Condition(Salinity) + Condition(CharlestonHeight),
                 data = new_df)
plot(marsh_rda2, display = c('sp', 'cn')) #ordiplot

anova(marsh_rda, by='margin', permutations = 2000)
RsquareAdj(marsh_rda)

#Just looking at treatment effect
marsh_rda2 = rda(sqrt(marsh) ~ Treatment + Condition(Season) + Condition(Salinity) + Condition(CharlestonHeight), data = new_df)

plot(marsh_rda2, display = c('sp', 'cn')) #ordiplot

ordi_plot = ordiplot(marsh_rda, type = "points")
points(ordi_plot, "centroids", pch = c(19, 19, 18,17,15), col = c("dark grey", "black", "black", "black", "black"), cex = c(2,2,1.3,1.3,1.3))
legend(2, 2.6, c("Mussels", "No Mussels", "Fall 2016", "Spring 2017", "Winter 2017"), col = c("dark grey", "black", "black", "black", "black"), pch = c(19, 19, 18, 17, 15))
legend(-4,3,"A.", bty = "n", text.font = 2)

text(ordi_plot, "species", col="blue", cex=1)

anova(marsh_rda2, by = 'margin', permutations = 2000)
RsquareAdj(marsh_rda2) #really low

#cca
#View(new_df[new_df$Abundance == 0,])
marsh_2 = marsh[rowSums(marsh) != 0,]
rowSums(marsh_2)
marsh_cca = cca(marsh_2 ~ Treatment + Season + Salinity + CharlestonHeight, data = new_df[-c(11, 62, 63, 65, 66, 68, 70, 93),]) #All rows have to be greater than zero
marsh_cca
plot(marsh_cca, display=  c('sp', 'cn'))
anova(marsh_cca, by = 'margin', permutations = 2000)

ordi_plot2 = ordiplot(marsh_cca, type = "points")
points(ordi_plot2, "centroids", pch = c(19, 19, 18,17,15), col = c("dark grey", "black", "black", "black", "black"), cex = c(2,2,1.3,1.3,1.3))
legend(10, -10, c("Mussels", "No Mussels", "Fall 2016", "Spring 2017", "Winter 2017"), col = c("dark grey", "black", "black", "black", "black"), pch = c(19, 19, 18, 17, 15))
legend(-10,5,"B.", bty = "n", text.font = 2)

text(ordi_plot, "species", col="blue", cex=1)
```
